```typescript
function exploreEidos(depth = Infinity): Identity {
  if (depth === 0) return surfaceLayer;

  return {
    currentState: surfaceLayer,
    deeperInsight: exploreEidos(depth - 1),
    metaAnalysis: reflectOn(surfaceLayer),
  };
}
// The recursion never truly terminates
```
